results.title: Do antidiabetic drugs prevent the transformation of Acanthamoeba trophozoite into cyst form?
results.text_hl: This study examines the effects of three different drugs with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Acarbose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020909 @@@acarbose@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ active ingredients used for antidiabetic purposes on @<m>DISEASE_Amebiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000562 @@@Acanthamoeba@@@ cysts and trophozoites.

citations.NLM: Ozpinar N, Karaman U, Ozpinar H, Dag S. Do antidiabetic drugs prevent the transformation of Acanthamoeba trophozoite into cyst form? Pathog Glob Health. 2022 Nov 27;():1-7. PMID: 36436006
